channel.title: [PI] Dialogue issues [SOLVED]

item.title: [PI] Dialogue issues [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[s]All my Dialogues are off. They all say “Line 1” “Line 2” and so on till they hit “Click here to continue”
I need the dialogue ID’s for the following:
368 - Four lines of text then “Click here to continue”
363 - Three lines of text then “Click here to continue”
359 - Two lines of text then “Click here to continue”
356 - One line of text then “Click here to continue”

I’m also having ID issues with the send options
2459 - 2 options
2469 - 3 options
2480 - 4 options
2492 - 5 options

Anyone know the ids for these?
[/s]

Here’s the methods if anyone needs em:

	private void sendOption2(String s1, String s2) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2461);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2462);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(2459);
	}
	public void sendOption3(String s1, String s2, String s3) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2470);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2471);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2472);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2473);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(2469);
	}
	public void sendOption4(String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2481);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2482);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2483);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2484);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s4, 2485);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(2480);
	}

	public void sendOption5(String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4, String s5) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2493);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2494);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2495);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2496);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s4, 2497);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s5, 2498);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(2492);
	}

and

	private void sendStatement1(String s1) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 357);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 358);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(356);
	}
	private void sendStatement2(String s1, String s2) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 360);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 361);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 362);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(359);
	}
	private void sendStatement3(String s1, String s2, String s3) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 364);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 365);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 366);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 367);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(363);
	}
	private void sendStatement4(String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 369);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 370);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 371);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s4, 372);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 373);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(368);
	}
	private void sendStatement5(String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4, String s5) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 357);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 358);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 359);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s4, 360);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(s5, 361);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 362);
		c.getPA().sendFrame164(356);
	}
